ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Emailed") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Left Message") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Emailed and Left Message") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "With Practitioner") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "With Pharmacist") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "HOLD") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Reconciled") ||ISPICKVAL(Status, "Logged for Tracking") ) && ISBLANK( First_Date_of_contact__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: First Date of contact is required
